tool_description: NumVerify offers a free, powerful JSON API for international and national phone number validation & lookup.
name: numverify
title: numverify

api_list.name: /validate
api_list.description: Main API endpoint used to validate phone numbers

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: the phone number to be validated

optional_parameters.name: country_code
optional_parameters.description: Specify a country code if you intend to use a national phone number for your request
